typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceTable as string,
	WaterMarkField as string
}
source(output(
		customer_Id as string,
		DOB as string,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Created_Modified_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($SourceTable)]) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(Max_Created_Modified_Date = iif(toString($SourceTable)=='Customer.csv',
max(toTimestamp(toString(byName($WaterMarkField)),
'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm')),max(toTimestamp(toString(byName($WaterMarkField)),
'dd-MM-yyyy')))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(Dest_Table = $SourceTable) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Max_Created_Modified_Date)==false())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Source as string,
		Source_Table as string,
		Dest_Table as string,
		Columns as string,
		Watermark_Column as string,
		Watermark_Value as timestamp,
		Enabled as boolean,
		Load_Flag as string,
		Status as string,
		Comment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Dest_Table'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Dest_Table,
		Watermark_Value = Max_Created_Modified_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
